result.execSummary:
The defendant Hector Hernandez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Hector Hernandez

records.addlTxt: Deft present in person with atty Jolin.     DA Moustakis present for the State.       Plea of NC.   Rights given.   Found guilty.    Sentenced to 5 months county jail,  with credit for 107 days already served.  Ct costs
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 20, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Deft present in person with atty Jolin.      DA Moustakis present for the State.    Complaint understood.   Plea of not guilty.      Pretrial set for 2-2-16  at 10:30 a.m.      Motion to modify bond: granted and bond modified to $500.00 cash, with conditions: 1.    Must have confirmation that hes still employeed at Northern Glass.   2.  Must have confirmation of rental at Edgewater.  3.  No contact with Melissa  Hernandez.   4.  Not to possess or consume intoxicants.

Before Judge Mohr, acting.     Deft present in person w/o an atty.     DA Moustakis present for the State.     Complaint understood.     Deft wants an atty.     Adjd until 1-19-16 at 11:30 a.m.    Bond continued

CC Garbowicz presiding. Deft appearing in person w/o an atty. ADA Breedlove present for State. No complaint yet. Bond set at $3000.00 cash with conditions: 1) Not to possess or consume intoxicants  2) No contact with Melissa Hernandez, Brady Arndt, Cynthia Boyle.  Adj to 1/15/2016 @ 1:00 p.m.
